channel.title: {pi} Safe pvp area in muti wildy
channel.description:
Trying to make a safe zone in multi area of wild..
okay this is what I did ..
under..
[code]public boolean safeZone() {[/code]
I put..
[code]|| absX > 3281 && absX < 3284 && absY > 3885 && absY < 3886[/code]
Please explain thanks, I might even give you a cookie once you login my server :D, anyways thanks moparscape for all the support lately.

item.title: {pi} Safe pvp area in muti wildy
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:


I don't think it ever returns true while using an int for absY?
You might want to use >= (greater than or equal to) and, or <= (smaller than or equal to).

And your screenshot makes me assume you want 3284 (absX) to be safezone as well so there you might want to use <= as well.

I don’t think it ever returns true while using an int for absY?
You might want to use >= (greater than or equal to) and, or <= (smaller than or equal to).

And your screenshot makes me assume you want 3284 (absX) to be safezone as well so there you might want to use <= as well.

Read full topic
